revised_title: The Sensitivity of the Ear to the Direction of Explosive Sounds: A Study on the Wave-Surface and Velocity of Projectiles
tldr: The author investigates the ability of the human ear to accurately determine the direction of explosive sounds, specifically those produced by high-velocity projectiles. By analyzing the wave-surface generated by the projectile and the observer's position relative to the firing point, the author demonstrates the ear's remarkable sensitivity to the direction of these sounds.
